review: Disappointing.  Have to regularly reboot my router to get an internet connection.  The router is 20 feet away with no obstructions.  Also the remote has a mind of its own.  When scrolling left or right and up or down, the cursor jumps all over the place like its stuck.
author: bobmums

review: Works great. Very easy to setup. I was watching TV in 10 minutes. I bought a second one for my apartment.
author: Peter Greene

review: Excellent product. Much easier to rewind and fast forward than with chromecast.
author: Daniel S. Campbell "Daniel S. Campbell"

review: Got this for our spare bedroom so our nieces could watch all their shows in their own space. It is easy for them to use (ages 5 &7) with the ability to set parental controls on it. It also travels well. We took it overnight with us to a hotel and it linked in easy with the hotel WiFi and we were able to use it right away!
author: Nicole

review: It's fast, streamlined and has a great interface while being inexpensive. I haven't tried sideloading other apps in yet, but it seems fairly simple. A great product!
